mapper.insert: INSERT INTO M_INVENTORY(invenid,id,invenname,content,cdate) VALUES((select nvl(max(invenid),0)+1 as invenid from M_INVENTORY),#{id}, #{invenname}, #{myList}, sysdate)

INSERT INTO M_CHART(chartid,rank,chrank,title,artist,album,thumbnail,url,period,separator,mlike,charttype) VALUES(#{chartid}, #{rank}, #{chRank}, #{title}, #{artist}, #{album},#{thumbnail},#{url},#{period},#{separator}, (select NVL(max(mlike),0) as mlike from M_CHART where artist=#{artist} and title = #{title}),#{chartType})
mapper.select: select chartid, rank, chRank , title, artist, album, thumbnail, url, mlike, period from M_CHART where period=#{period} and chartType=#{chartType} order by rank
select w.chartid from M_CHART w left OUTER JOIN m_like l ON l.chartid= w.chartid where period = #{period} and id= #{id} and separator=#{separator} order by rank
select url from M_CHART where period=#{period} and chartType=#{chartType} order by rank
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_like(likeid,chartid,id) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(likeid), 0) + 1 as likeid FROM m_like),#{chartid}, #{id})
mapper.select: select invenid,invenname,CDATE from M_INVENTORY where id=#{id} order by invenid
mapper.delete: delete from M_INVENTORY where id=#{id} and INVENID=#{invenId}
mapper.select: select distinct period from M_CHART where charttype=#{chartType} order by period desc
